data.message: I DONT EVEN CARE. maybe instead of selling unobtainable love you might want to promote woman to do the right thing instead of harassing and stealing their kids. MAYBE YOU WANT TO DO SOME THING GOOD WITH THIS LIFE HAVING ALL THE OPTIONS AND MONEY TO DO SO. but no go sell some hats and dolls promote some unobtainable love who fucking cares who you love? maybe you should inspire woman to do the right thing. i wasn't thinking to get with a dude like you i still don't, if you want to be chased and loved by other then the dumbest side of humanity you should do something to inspire it, LIKE PROMOTING WOMAN RIGHTS INSTAD OF SINGING YOU DONT LOVE ME HER OR WHO EVER. NEWS FLASH WE DONT LOVE YOU EITHER OR HAVE REASONS TO,
